snippet: A powerful storm tossed the luxury cruise liner M.S. Silver Explorer, injuring four crew members and fraying the nerves of 90 students from the elite Hotchkiss School in Lakeville, Conn.
abstract: Powerful storm tosses luxury cruise liner M S Silver Explorer, injuring four crew members and fraying the nerves of 90 students from elite Hotchkiss School in Lakeville, Conn, who were on three-week excursion to Antarctica.
lead_paragraph: A powerful storm tossed the luxury cruise liner M.S. Silver Explorer, injuring four crew members and fraying the nerves of 90 students from the elite Hotchkiss School in Lakeville, Conn.

headline.seo: Hotchkiss Students on Antarctic Trip Encounter Whales and 30-Foot Wave
headline.main: On Antarctic Trip, Students Encounter Whales and a 30-Foot Wave
headline.print_headline: On Antarctic Trip, Students Encounter Whales and a 30-Foot Wave
